m_szDocTitle: GM debuts car-sharing brand as it speeds up urban mobility focus - The Portland Press Herald / Maine Sunday Telegram
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- increase font size GM debuts car-sharing brand as it speeds up urban mobility focus As ride-sharing and car-sharing grow, General Motors swants to be at the forefront, but says selling cars will remain a big part of its business. By TOM KRISHERThe Associated Press Share Read Article DETROIT — The final destination is a mystery, but General Motors is taking another step on its fast-moving journey into new ways of getting around.
